content: प्रतिभा {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To shine, appear bright or luminous; प्रतिभांत्यद्य वनानि केतकीनां <ls>Ghaṭ. 15.</ls> {@--2@} To show oneself, become manifest. {@--3@} To seem, appear; स्त्रीरत्नसृष्टिरपरा प्रतिभाति सा मे <ls>Ś. 2. 9</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 47</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 38</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">6. 54.</ls> {@--4@} To occur to, come into the mind of; as in नोत्तरं प्रतिभाति मे. {@--5@} To fall to the lot or share of. {@--6@} To seem fit or proper; <ls>Pt. 3.</ls>

प्रतिभा {@--1@} An appearance, a look. {@--2@} Light, splendour. {@--3@} Intellect, understanding; <ls>Ki. 16. 27</ls>; <ls>Vikr. 1. 18</ls>, <ls n="Vikr. 1.">23.</ls> {@--4@} Genius, bright conception, vivid imagination; (प्रज्ञा नवनवोन्मेषशालिनी प्रतिभा मता). {@--5@} An image, reflection. {@--6@} Audacity, impudence. {@--7@} Suitableness, agreeableness.
